description: Episode of Series "Mirror of Germany. The German Scene = Deutschland Spiegel". Magazine items: Football, West Germany vs. Argentina Juniors; Camping sites, coutry areas, boating highlights 1978; Helmut Schmidt, International leaders meeting; Improvement and emergence of new political city of Bonn; Recycling of cars every 20 seconds and crush 1000 cars per day; Peruvian artefacts in new museum in Berlin with department for the blind and a children's wing, hands on and educational unit; Horse breeding and riding popular only 20 percent of stud released for breeding per year.
